channel.title: Edge Services on Storj Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Edge Services on Storj Docs

item.title: Auth Service
item.description: Auth Service # Overview # When objects are shared via the Linksharing service or via the S3-compatible hosted gateway, an Access Grant is automatically registered with the Auth Service. The Access Grant used in conjunction with the edge services does contain encryption information for the objects that are within the scope of the Access Grant. Access Grants registered with the Auth Service are encrypted with an encryption key that is not stored or persisted by any Storj Service.
